title: Construction of a new Two Storied Building for Divisional Secretariat, Minipe
decision_details: - this Divisional Secretary's Division in the Kandy District consists of 48 Grama Niladhari Divisions and the total population is 51,577.  The proposal made by Hon. W.D.J. Seneviratne, Minister of Public Administration and Home Affairs, to construct a new two storied Building for this Divisional Secretariat, at a total cost of Rs.47.7 million, was approved by the Cabinet.
